data.title: Loveberry Fest
data.meta_description: Get tickets on Humanitix - Loveberry Fest. The New Farm, 10 Cargo Way, San Francisco, CA 94124, USA. Sunday June 2nd 2024. Find event information.
data.text:
FIRST EVER LOVEBERRY FEST

Aft + Top Chefs: Afterthought is a Fillmore native and one the most up and coming Rappers in the Bay Area. The blending styles of classic & modern west coast hiphop with jazz, RnB, & Funk make this group an unforgettable live experience.

Having just got back from his first multi-national Tour Afterthought is backed by the Top Chefs, an eclectic group of young talented musicians from all over the Bay Area.Â

A-1: Hailing from San Francisco California, A-1 lives and makes music by the same code: THURL. Think, Hustle, Understand, Really Live/Love. A swiss-army-blade of a rapper, A-1 can break your heart with meaningful storytelling, bust your gut with a legendary tour van freestyle, or turn you inside out with emotionally charged bars and wordplay. For lyrics that cover everything from partying to politics, deep love and meaningful relationships to game spittin and braggadocio, look no further than the music of A-1.

DJ Quest: A veteran guru on the turn tables, DJ Quest has been a prominent DJ in the Bay Area since the 90s competing in numerous DJ Battles and creating an impressive discography of original music and features. He is also the creator of Hamster style scratching which is utilized by DJs all over the world today.

Loveberry: Liam Berry is a Guitarist, Producer, and Multi-Media Artist born and raised in the Bay Area. His music blends the likes of indie, grunge and jazz with elements of lofi, psychedelia and funk. Loveberry plays as a three piece band live featuring the incredible Max Nesbet on bass and the one n only Eddy Braun on drums.Â

Strife Gang: A collective of some of the most young and talented underground hiphop artists in the Bay Area. With alternating genres of modern and underground hiphop and featuring: SvChucky, Spyda, Vazh, Xanubis, Darin Steele and Mooseman, this group is a force of nature you donât want to miss.Â

Angalo: The brain child of Thomas Bombara, Angalo is a group of rotating skillful jazz musicians that lend their talents to creating avant garde jazz fusion inspired by the likes of Fred HoÂ

Coexist: A self described sultry fusion of R&B and Jazz, Coexist play with the line between vintage and modern song writing sensibilities while simultaneously drawing you in with captivating and soulful melodies.

Oddity: Combining luscious vocal melodies with hiphop infused compositions inspired by the likes of Billy Strayhorn and Gil Evans, Oddity takes you on a groovy sonic journey that explores themes of reinventing ones self and the struggles of self love.Â

Jumo duo: A group of assorted musical veterans coming together to celebrate and share the music of bands like West Montgomery and Duke Ellington with a modern twist.

FRANK GRIZZLYâs : A Cali-Mexican restaurant based in the Bayview, Frank Grizzlyâs isÂ run by a family with a passion for providing delicious & high qualityÂ meals cooked with love for an affordable price!

Austen Zombres: A visual artist on a mission to create beautiful and jaw dropping art pieces only using recycled cardboard.

Misia Soup: Misia Farris works in a variety of mediums to make eye catching and unique takes on street life and femininity.

Loveberry: A multi media artist known for his intricate line work and psychedelic backgrounds scenes.

L7: A prolific and talented graphic designer whose focus on eye catching visuals and sleek minimalism shines through in every design.Â

Yume Luv: A young and talented brand clothing designer finding his voice through street wear and accessories!

Sticker Saints: An artist run small company focused on making custom stickers for creatives and small businesses alike!Â
